Lets you build : A ranged unit that throws axes
Lets you upgrade the Archer to Crossbow Archer
Lets you upgrade the Skirmishers to Elite Skirmishers
Lets you upgrade the Gisarme to Halberdier
Lets you upgrade the Swordsman to Broad Swordsman
Lets you upgrade the Knight to Heavy Knight
Lets you build: A fast mounted unit, cheaper than Knights
Lets you build: A fast mounted and ranged unit, cheaper than Horsearchers
Lets you build: A slow melee unit, with good defense against arrow attacks
Lets you build: A ranged anti-infantry unit, good against great mass of enemy units
Lets you build: A ranged anti-infantry unit
Slinger is a good option against infantry, it has multiple shots.
The swordsman is equipped with a sword. the swordsman is a basic unit, ideal to take down enemy buildings and to take care of the enemy skirmishers.
Spearmen are equipped with long spears, so they can fight effectively against cavalry forces. However they are unable to deal serious damage to infantry and buildings.
Archers are equipped with bows and arrows. They are able to destroy enemy swordsmans, spearmans and ornithopters, but they can\'t deal serious damage to skirmishers and battering rams.

Skirmishers are equipped with a large shield which protects them from arrows, and a couple javelins. They are only usefull against archers. They have less damage than archers and they are easily taken out by close range fighters.
Knights are very powerful against infantry except for the spearman. They can easily take out several soldiers.

The healers are non-combat, supportive units who don\'t wear armor and don\'t carry weapons. They heal your and you allies\' wounded units and converse some enemy units. They are best used from behind a shield line (a couple units which can take in the damage)

Workers are non-combat supportive units who carry tools with them. They construct buildings which help you in defending the TCs or recruiting units. They also mend the damaged buildings and non-flesh-and-blood units
Ornithopters are flying units. They can deal serious damage and they receive only 1-2 damage from close range units. However long range units can deal out massive damage against them.
Assasins are special units. They have several skills which are listed. Use them to take out the strong enemies.
Wagons are non-combat transporting units. They are able to transport units. Their maximum capacity is 3 unit. Use them to transport slow moving units.

Catapults are siege machines. They are able to take out enemy buildings very fast. In addition they are able to deal massive damage to enemy units too. Use them against strong defensive buildings or against infantry (because they have a low chance to hit a fast moving unit)
Scouts have low cost and they can move fast. They are very usefull on maps with Fog or explore visibility.
Transport ships are non-combat transporting naval units which can transport units over water. Their maximum capacity is 1 unit.
Galleys are naval units. they have a good range. They can deal serious damage to transports. In addition they are a good support to land units.
Destroyers are naval units. They have good attack power. They can easily take down other ships and coastal defenses.
Spartan Hoplites are elite units. They have heavy weapons, thick armor and large shields.
Longbowmen are elite archers. Their weapons are more powerful than the simple bows. In addition longbows can fire their arrows in a bigger range.
Missionaries are healers on horses. They have less chance to convert an enemy and recovers less hp, but they have better mobility.
Templars are a mixture of healers and swordsmen. They are good in fighting, and they can heal.
Horse archers are the combination of archer and horseman. They are fast and can attack from a range.

Money couriers are special units. they can speed up the researches and the recruiting with one turn. Go with them into any factory building to speed up production. Or use their ability to pay for mercenaries.
War elephants are very strong units. They can take in quite much damage and deal a serious damage to enemies. However, it is very slow.
Battering rams are very efdective against buildings. In addition they are nearly totally resistant against long ranged units.
Great transports are the advanced version of the transports. They can carry 3 units, but they are muxh slower then the simple transports.
Samurais are very powerful. They can attack twice every turn.
Trebuchets are master siege weapons. They can destroy a building easily, and they can support you in combat too. You can only train them in castles.
Elephant archer are nearly the same as war elephant. They attack from a range.

Poison archers are extremely deadly. They pour poison on their arrows, which will poison the enemy it hits. The poisoning lasts for several turns, dealing damage to the unit. You can buy poison archers in the upgrades section for gems.
Axe throwers are axemans who were trained to use their axes in a range.
Crossbowmans use crossbows instead of bows. You can upgrade your archers to crossbowmans in the archery range when the archer to crossbow archer upgrade is bought.

Skirmisher masters are the upgraded version of the skirmishers. They have higher hp, power and armor. You can upgrade your skirmishers in an archery range when the skirmisher to master skirmisher upgrade is bought.

Broadswordsman is the upgraded version of the swordsman. They have significantly higher attack and a little higher health. You can train broadswordsman when the swordsman to broadswordsan tech is researched.
Heavy knights are the upgraded version of the knight. They have better armore and attack. You can train heavy knights when the knight to heavy knight tech is researched in a stables.
The guard tower is a basic defensive structure. It has low damage and able to carry 1 unit. Use it to build a quick defense and to give cover to your units after an attack.
The fortress is an advanced defensive structure. It is able to carry 2 unit. It has much higher attack power, range and health then it\'s ancestor, the guard tower.

The castle is the largest defensive structure avaiable. It has a size of 2x3 tile. It can fire arrows 3 times a turn, and able to carry 4 units. This structure has the highest health and armor. And you are able to recruit trebuchets (see upper) in your castles.
Walls are defensive structures. You can use them to tank the damage dealt by close range units. Doing so will let you to take down the enemy behind the walls (you need ranged units to do so).
Barracks is a producing structure where you can produce every type of infantry. This is the building where you can upgrade your infantry into elite infantry (Eg.: swordsman->broadswordsman).
Archery range is a producing structure where you can produce ranged units. You can upgrade your ranged units into elite ranged units here. Such like in the barracks.

The stables is a producing structure where you can produce mounted units, except for the ranged ones. This is the place where you can upgrade your mounted units into elite mounted units. Such like in the barracks.
Siege workshop is a producing building where you can produce siege weapons and ornithopters.
Church is a producing structure which can heal nearby units. It produces healers and missionaries.
Blacksmith is a research type structure. You can research the unit upgradeing (armor, weapon techs).
The dock is a producing building which can produce naval units.
The advancements center is a research structure where you can research structure tech (massive wall..).
The Shielder has a great shield, do well protected against arrows.
The Chariot Archer is similar to Chariot and has ranged attack like the archer.
The Chariot is mounted unit that has a better movement than foot soldiers.
A ranged anti-infantry unit, good against great mass of enemy units.
Writing tech gives the player the ability to see all what all allies see.
Loyalty makes all player unit resistant to conversions, they only loose most of their HP instead.
Machinery gives access to special tower buildings.
Ballistics lets you build advances siege engines.
Flight lets you build flying units.
Town patrol increases the sight of structures.
Massive walls reinforces buildings by a larger margin, than Masonry.
Ambidextria increases the effectiveness (mend rate) of your workers.
Area Damage techs will make catapults more effective by giving them area damage.
Persuasion increases the conversion possibilty of your units.
Steal tech gives you more chance to steal a tech after occupying an enemy TC.
Archery tech gives +1 power and +1 range to archer units.
Archery level 2 tech gives +1 extra power and +1 range to archer units.
Archer armor level 1 tech increases armor (normal/pierce) of light armored units.
Archer armor level 2 tech increases armor (normal/pierce) of light armored units.
Cavalry armor level 1 tech increases armor (normal/pierce) of mounted melee units.
Cavalry armor level 2 tech increases armor (normal/pierce) of mounted melee units.
Infantry armor level 1 tech increases armor (normal/pierce) of heavier armored foot units.
Infantry armor level 2 tech increases armor (normal/pierce) of heavier armored foot units.
Sword mastery level 1 tech increases attack power of melee units.
Sword mastery level 2 tech increases attack power of melee units.
Upgrades your Archers to stronger Crossbowmen.
Upgrades your Skirmishers to stronger Elite Skirmishers.
Upgrades your Gisarmemen to stronger Halberdiers.
Upgrades your Swordmen to stronger Broad Swordmen.
Upgrades your Knights to stronger Heavy Knights.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. He found an old sword along his journey, which the blacksmiths can reforge to make it stronger. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee is rather average with only a wool tunic to protect him, but he can have his sword or armor upgraded when he gains more experience.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. His chief weapon is an old sword, which he found along his journey. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee\'s sword has been upgraded, and he can have either his sword or his armor upgraded when he gains more experience.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. His chief weapon is an old sword, which he found along his journey. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee\'s armor has been upgraded, and he can either learn the bow or upgrade his armor again when he gains more experience.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. His chief weapon is an old sword, found along his journey. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee\'s sword has been again upgraded, and, when he gains more experience, he can master the sword or gain additional armor, as he will be proficient in strategy.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. His chief weapon is an old sword, found along his journey. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee\'s sword and armor have both been upgraded, and, when he gains more experience, he can be trained to travel faster or gain additional armor, as he will be proficient in strategy.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. His chief weapon is an old sword, found along his journey. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee\'s armor has been again upgraded, and, when he gains more experience, he can be trained in use of his sword or gain additional armor, as he will be proficient in strategy.

Bearing an ancient sword that he found, Trainee was the first to arrive at the base of the Night Watch. Though not first in strength or skill, he is always in leadership, for a good leader is also a learner. Trainee has been upgraded in maximum attack, his sword a potent power, as he is proficient in strategy. Yet still he gains knowledge as he waits for his time to retake his home.

Bearing an ancient sword that he found, Trainee was the first to arrive at the base of the Night Watch. Though not first in strength or skill, he is always in leadership, for a good leader is also a learner. Trainee has been upgraded fully into a deadly balanced unit, his sword a potent power, as he is proficient in strategy. Yet still he gains knowledge as he waits for his time to retake his home.

Bearing an ancient sword that he found, Trainee was the first to arrive at the base of the Night Watch. Though not first in strength or skill, he is always in leadership, for a good leader is also a learner. Trainee has been upgraded fully into an armored balanced unit, his shield a potent power, as he is proficient in strategy. Yet still he gains knowledge as he waits for his time to retake his home.

Bearing an ancient sword that he found, Trainee was the first to arrive at the base of the Night Watch. Though not first in strength or skill, he is always in leadership, for a good leader is also a learner. Trainee has been upgraded in maximum armor, his conservative attrition tactics a potent power, as he is proficient in strategy. Yet still he gains knowledge as he waits for his time to retake his home.
Congrats, dear player! You have earned this Double-Chocolate Cookie, baked by the Night Watch themselves. Never mind that it is 2000 years old, this is a mighty gift!
The Shadow Knight is the right hand of the night. Beware! Yet maybe his heavy armor has chinks in it that close combat can exploit...
The Shadow Warrior is a fearsome weapon in the hand of his master. Yet he is only the left hand. His armor seems to be more susceptible to arrows...
The Shadow King is Lord of the Night. What Light can pierce pure Darkness???

Polish Hussars, or winged Polish Hussars, was one of the best cavalry units in history.

Man-at-arms is the upgraded version of the Broadswordsman. They have significantly higher attack and a little higher health. You can train Man-at-arms when the Broadswordsan to Man-at-arms tech is researched.

Originating in Germany, the \'Osterhase\', or Easter bunny, arrived in the USA in Pennsylvania in the 1700\'s. According to folkloric legend this variety of hare lays eggs, and brings candy and toys to children.

Saracen warriors are light units with a large sword.They deal a lot of damage, but are easily destroyed.
Saracen riders grew up with their horses.They aren\'t heavily armored, but they can deal a lot damage. With a horde of them you can run down enemy infantry troops.
Saracen archers have strong bows which make high damage. However, their bows are smaller and so have a smaller range than other bows.

Crusaders are Knights and Soldiers from Medieval Europe. They are strong swordsman with a good armor. They deal large damage to buildings and are good to defeat spearman. But there large weakness are cavalry and archer.
Veteran Crusader are loyal and strong. They are skilled Swordsman who can take much damage.

Crusader Archer are like normal archer. The only.difference is that they combined the preferences of the bows of different nations, that they have a bow with higher range that deals more damage. With a few Crusader to defend them they are unstoppable.
Crusader Horseman are yust Crusaders with higher mobility and a bit more strength.
Veteran Crusader Horseman are Crusader horseman with higher experience. They have money and a good armor and a better sword from their previous Crusades.
Only the best Crusader Veterans have the chance to become a Crusader Lord. Then they have their own horse, and the best armor and sword of the whole Crusader army.
Saracen Pikes are useful to defeat the enemy cavalry. But against a swordsman, they are totally useless. Use them wisely and protect them until enemy cavalry charge you.
Lets you build: The Mounted Templar is a fast cavalry unit with conversion resistance and healing ability, best use for hunting infantry.
The Mounted Templar is a fast cavalry unit with conversion resistance and healing ability, best use for hunting infantry.
The Upgraded Mounted Templar is a fast cavalry unit with conversion resistance and healing ability, best use for hunting infantry.

A Gate will let you tru your units but not enemy units.
The priestess that heads all the priests in the kingdom and serves as the healer of the royal family.
Ashigarus were used in the Japanese feudal times. They were working the land in peace and took up weapons during war. This type of Ashigaru is equiped with a yari, which is similar to a spear.
Lets you build: A Tanegashima Ashigaru that is one of the first gunned unit of that time.

Ashigarus were used in the Japanese feudal times. They were working the land in peace and took up weapons during war. This type of Ashigaru is equiped with a Tanegashima, which is one of the first guns used in warfare.

...Born on the Fourth of July! I\'ve got a Yankee Doodle Sweetheart: she\'s my Yankee Doodle joy! Yankee Doodle went to town, riding on a pony: I am that Yankee Doodle boy!

The gunpowder was introduced in european warfare in the 13th century (approx.), the technology came from China, tru the Silk Road. You can research it in Advancements center.

This worker is able to construct many towers that will be useful for your defense. Workers are one of your few offensive weapons.
Crossbow Towers have a medium range and medium damage. They are a fairly nice consistent tower to start with.

Sharpshooter Towers have a long range, but are generally weaker than most other towers. However, they are extremely effective against weak unarmored units. They are best used to support two stronger positions, as their long range can cover large amounts of territory.
The Longbow Towers are similar to the Crossbow Towers, substituting a slightly longer range for a reduced attack.
AN IMPORTANT ASSET!!! This tower can fix other towers beside it. Be sure to protect this.
The dudes garrisoned in this tower are used to the cold. Equipped with new handgonne, these toughies can be built even in the forest.
A last ditch defense - our fail-safe. The enemies cannot see these; place them behind your lines along traveled routes. When the unsuspecting enemy steps near, unleash your fury!
These are extremely weak towers with low attacks. But they are very interesting for this reason: they can construct other spawn towers.

Saint Stephen I (hu. \'Szent Istvan\'), c. AD 975-1038, was the last Grand Prince of Hungary, and became the first King of Hungary. He united the Carpathian Basin under his leadership, and is recognized as the founder of the State of Hungary.
Lets you upgrade the Healer to Priest
Priests are more effective than Healers in terms of healing an convincing enemy to change sides.
Cannon tower is an extremely good fortification that is good against ships, siege engines and enemy buildings.
The Centurion is an officer of the Roman army. Centurion increases the morale of nearby units.
The Cannon ship is a more modern way of naval warfare, use it for coast bombarding, very effevtive against buildings and slow moving units. It gets inaccurate on faster units.
These fearsome battleships use fire and rockets to cause devastation to fleet and fortification!

Alastar became the second to reach the base of the Night Watch. His ox-goad he had fashioned into a spear of sorts. His specialty even now is anti-cavalry. When he has gained more experience, he can have his spear or armor upgraded.

Alastar became the second to reach the base of the Night Watch. His ox-goad he had fashioned into a spear of sorts. His specialty even now is anti-cavalry. He has been upgraded fully, with his spear as a shaft of light to pierce the galloping darkness. He will be proficient in strategy.

Alastar became the second to reach the base of the Night Watch. His ox-goad he had fashioned into a spear of sorts. His specialty even now is anti-cavalry. H1s armor has been upgraded fully, a spear of light to withstand the galloping darkness. He will be proficient in strategy.

Alastar was the second warrior to find the base of the Night Watch. He is led by his friend Trainee, and proficient in strategy in his own right. But Alastar\'s specialty is mounted units. His spear is a shaft of light of epic proportions to pierce the Darkness.

Trainee was the first of his friends to reach the base of the Night Watch. He has risen to be the commander of all his friends: on a deadly quest to win back through the shadow to his home. He has slim hope, but clings to it as a guiding star. His sword (found along his journeys) was made from a star that fell blazing from heaven.

Lets you build: Mending ship that can fix your damaged ships.
Mending ship that can fix your damaged ships, protect them because they are fragile.

The Turtle ship was developed by the Koreans to defend the penninsula of Chosen (Korea) against the Japanese invasions. The deck was roofed over and spiked to protect the crew. The prow was shaped like a dragon head to intimidate. Many times, a weapon like a cannon was hidden inside the dragon\'s mouth. This is a useful ranged anti-ship unit.
Asterix is one of the most clever Gauls. But like all his friends (except Obelix) he needs Magical Mixture prepared by Panoramix.
As a child, Obelix had fallen into big Panoramix\'s pot with Magical Mixture. Now he is the biggest and the strongest Gaul, but he cannot drink Mixture anymore.
The oldest man in the Gaul village - and the smartest. Only he can prepare Magical Mixture for the rest of villagers.

The Siege Mantlet is a useful tool for hiding archers and other more vulnerable units to move them into position for attacking.

The Colosseum or Coliseum, also known as the Flavian Amphitheatre is an oval amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome, Italy. Built of concrete and sand, it is the largest amphitheatre ever built and is considered one of the greatest works of architecture and engineering ever.

The Hastati was a early Rome elite unit. Hastati has been trained young skimirsh/melee combat warriors. In early Rome they were the main force of the Roman Empires legions.

The Velites Was A early Rome Unit. Velites has been young Skimirsh Warriors. They wear a wolf-head-helmet and can hide in forests and high grass. In early rome they supported the main force of the Roman Empires Legions.

Etruscs has been a Nation of Individuals. Each Soldier made his Armor and sword alone (or bought it alone). Thats why theres no typical Army Equipment. Most Etruscians had a bronze armor and a Sword or Spear.

The Triarii was a early Rome elite unit. Triarii has been well trained, high-disiplined Heavy Infantry Unit. If Hastati and Principes weren\'t enough - Triarii helped. In many battles they didn\'t even need to participate though. So it comes to the triarii - a saying, that means crisis - originated from that. In early Rome they where a part of nearly each Roman Empires legion.

The Principes was a early Rome main battle unit. Principes has been well trained high-disiplined melee combat warriors. Hastati with enough experience and recognition became Principes. In early Rome they were a main part of the Roman Empires legions.

Auxiliary units are a good way to recruit a large Roman army in a short amount of time. Auxiliary units were the support to the Roman elite. They are strong, but if you recruit them, you may end up with a swordman, an archer, a skirmisher, or a knight.
An auxiliary archer is a strong ranged unit more powerful than a regular archer, but not as strong as a Sagittarius.
An auxiliary skirmisher is an anti-archer unit, more powerful than a normal archer.
The auxiliary swordman is the main support to the Roman Legion.
Auxiliary knights are mounted Roman units useful for scouting and hunting down infantry ahead of the Legions.

Lets you build: Genoese Crossbowman: The Genoese crossbowman is a powerful ranged unit for its price. It has high pierce armor and attack, both of which are made more formidable by archer upgrades at the blacksmith. However, as mercenary units, they must be supplied by money couriers to pay for their service.

The Genoese crossbowman is a powerful ranged unit for its price. It has high pierce armor and attack, both of which are made more formidable by archer upgrades at the blacksmith. However, as mercenary units, they must be supplied by money couriers to pay for their service.
Lets you build: Flail: The flail is similar to a mace, except the striking head is attached by a chain. A flail can strike around the shield causing more damage.

A voulge is a spear like weapon that can be used to slash or stab an enemy. These fierce infantry units can be used against cavalry or even other infantry.
Dojo is a building that can train Asian inspired units and techs. Martial arts like karate and judo were taught in Dojos.

Viking Ship is a fast transport that is dangerous in battle nonetheless. The vikings would rather capture the ships than send them to the bottom of the sea. Garrisoned units take damage before the ship and the ship can be captured
Heavy war elephants are very strong units. They can take in quite much damage and deal a serious damage to enemies.

Atlatls are ancient weapons that preceded the bow and arrow in most parts of the world. They are made of a handle and a hook that can hurl a spear farther than the hand alone could.
The Sipahi were the Turkish elite cavalry. They were used as a mopping cavalry when the enemy armies started to break from the infantry.
The shield knights carry large shields. They are a tough defensive unit that are especially difficult to kill with arrows.

The heavy chariot upgrades your chariots to increase their attack power and stats.
The Ninjas are secretive super warriors. They can throw a shuriken or change weapons.

A mahout is an elephant rider, trainer, or keeper. Usually, a mahout starts as a boy in the family profession when he is assigned an elephant early in its life. They remain bonded to each other throughout their lives.
These armoured spearmen can withstand many arrows before they fall and are also effective cavalry slayers.
The spearmen of the byzantine army are very versatile and effective cavalry slayers, trained to protect the Byzantine empire.
Hangonne - an early gunpowder hand cannon. The bow was still considered a superior weapon, but the guns was feared all the same.
Yabusame is a type of mounted archery in traditional Japanese army. A mounted samurai with bow and arrows, wearing a horned helmet.
Horsemen trained in the use of javelins, they are especially adept at taking out archers behind the lines

The third upgrade of the knight. They are some of the most veteran mounted knights and highly skilled in using heavy weapons and armour.
The heavy shield knights carry larger shields and are very heavily armored. They can withstand many blows and still charge forward without a scratch.

The heavy battering ram is covered in metal plates which allow it to withstand more blows than the wooden battering ram, making it far more effective against buildings while arrows are almost completely ineffective against it.
The amazons can move stealthily as one with nature and they kill their prey with poisonous blow darts

Palisade gates are a cheap fortification. They can be built easily to prevent enemies from reaching your vulnerable base while your units can pass through them. But they can still be quickly destroyed.
This is a FUN unit (available only in spells enabled games). This is a teaser for the upcoming WW2 alternative of the game.\n\nHave fun with it!
This is a FUN unit (available only in spells enabled games). Download Age of Fantasy and try out the tons of fantasy units and maps!
Japanese practitioners in the art of divination. They were hired by the shogunate to ward off evil spirits. They are also good fortune tellers

Svardstav or swordstaff is a Scandinavian pole arm used in the middle ages. Svardstav can be used for both slashing and stabbing enemy. Svardstaviers are very effective against cavalry and they can also fight well against other infantry.
Increases the attack and conversion resistance of units within a range.
Inventing Balistraria will add range to all kind of towers (eg. fortresses, forts and castles)
This sign marks something important. Best to investigate to see what it could be.
A mace is a weapon with a heavy head on a solid shaft used to bludgeon opponents. Use the Mace to beat down opposing infantry or light siege works
Celtic warriors served as mercenaries in many armies of the classical period. The sight of these fierce clansmen would strike terror in enemy hearts. These units have two attack actions.
The Golden Horde controlled the largest contiguous landmass of any empire. These fierce Mongolian riders combine speed and furious quick attacks perfect for raiding and decimating light units.
The Korean fire arrow launcher or hwacha can fire a barrage of over a 100 arrows at a time, very useful against swarms of enemies.
The towers are manned by more guards now and they shoot more arrows, which results in towers having higher attack.

These swordsmen were specialised in the use of zweihander, a two-handed sword. They can cleave through multiple enemies with a single strike.
The upgrade of the zweihander wielder. They are better equipped and can more skillfully cleave through many enemies dealing a lot of damage.
Fishing boats are special units. they can speed up the researches and the recruiting with one turn.
The Boarding ship are able to board enemy ships to acquire it to own posession
Floating petards are explosive filled barrels or crades, it is an ancient Chinese design, you can build them by workers or laid by upgraded Demolition ships
A little boat that can only carry a single foot soldier

This is the spawner for the first 2 players. These Spawnpoints are for random map designers to indicate the place of locations where Players should spawn. USE TWO from all kind of spawnpoints (2 x sp2 + 2 x sp4 + 2 x sp6) so your map will be prepared for 6 players too. If you use less than the logic will spawn the rest of the players with the default logic
This is the spawner for the 3rd and 4th players. Read more on TC Spawnpoint 2 description
This is the spawner for the 5th and 6th players. Read more on TC Spawnpoint 2 description

These soldiers were the finest of the roman army, they serve as the bodyguard of the roman generals. It\'s powerful infantry unit with very high armors and great power. Especially strong in formation.
Elite Longbowmen have upgraded longbow as main weapon, which still have higher range than the simple bows and is even more powerful. They are also more resilient.
Powerful celtic warrior, which has good attack and can survive quite a punishment. They become more skilled in attack and resistance with each enemy killed.
Hospitallers are crossbowmen with great defence, conversion resistance and healing ability.
Hospitaller Knights are even better with their crossbow. They also have better defence and healing ability. They cannot be converted.

This is the main hall in which Nordic clansmen conduct matters of celebration and war. Ruled by Thanes, Jarls, and High Kings, these Nordic Holds house the mightiest and most fearless of warriors. This building can train nordic units.
They are masters of the way of throwing axe, achieving greater range and power. They are also trained to be more resilient.
Self-sufficient exploration ship used for long travels. It can carry 1 non-mechanical unit. It can repair itself a little.

They have less chance to convert an enemy and recovers less hp than regular priests, but they have better mobility. Missionary becoming a missionary priest get\'s greater healing ability, range of heal, conversion resistance and is a little more convincing.
Raiders is specialist on attacking buildings one enemy flanks or rear. They deal great damage to them, by knowing which part of structure is weakest, and where to set fire.
It let\'s legionaries and pretorians to gain additional defence by getting into large scale formation. Each unit gets additional armor for every other trained unit adjacent.
Elite Longbowman has greater hp and power, than original.
Hospitaller Knights have better range, power, hp and healing ability.
Master Axe Throwers have greater range, hp and power.
Gives all axe throwing units increased range of attack.
Throws a pilum - especially prepared heavy javelin.
Veteraning increases power and hp for every enemy killed.
All roman units in range gets increased speed.
All roman units in range gets increased attack.
This tower is long to build considering not so strong defence. But it\'s great at shooting armies. It has weak power, but attacks multiple times every turn in very long range.

High platform for slingers to shoot heavy stones. Stones in the size of a fist attacks deals additional damage, hard to be stopped by armor. As it\'s only a platform it has weak defence and can\'t carry any additional units, but it can be build in forests.

Reinforced guard tower is still a basic defensive structure. It\'s able to carry 1 unit. Use it to build a quick defense and to give cover to your units after an attack. It has more hp, range and damage than original.
The Aeneator is in charge of signalling roman soldiers. He also provides rhythm to march to, making your troops a bit faster.

Ballista Tower has ballista built onto the top of tower. This tower is reinforced and more durable than most, plus it can shoot twice. The best place for this anti-infantry heavyweight is near the frontlines.
Rebuilds scouting towers (Watchtower, Forest Sentry) to allow proper manning. Upgraded towers can shoot.

Upgrades all Heavy Sling Towers to Handgonne Towers. Thanks to gunpower we can exchange throwing rocks with sling to shooting them from handgonnes. It\' more accurate. It also allows greater range and packs more power.
This tower is specialized in observing. It can even reveal stealthy units like spies or assassins. Can shoot. Can be build in forests.
This tower is specialized in observing. It can even reveal sthealthy units like spies or assassins. Can shoot.
Cannon Ship with double number of cannons. Switching cannons to let the other cool itself allows for greater overall power.
Armored vehicle with cannons. Designed by a genius.

Trou de Loup is a trap made by digging cone shaped pit, placing sharpened wooden stake at the center and covering it with light cover (like wicker) and a thin layer of soil. Especially effective on cavalry.

Sharp, long nails joined together to form weapon, that thrown on ground stays with at least 1 of them upward. Many of them placed close to each other forms a field, that will damage passing enemy units. More effective on mounted units. Additionally has poison.

Cheval de frise is heavy log cut or drilled to stick sharp stakes pointed towards at least two sides. It is not advisable to attack it with mounted units, as they have greater chance to impale themselves.
Smaller than temple place of belief. It\'s having the same recovery and garrison capabilities, but doesn\'t allow any training.
A symbol raising morale of an army.
After building this road, forest is passable by wagons and siege machines. Beware - it can be used by enemy.
All foot units in range gets increased speed.
Drums were setting a rhythm for marching. Drum sounds allow for faster movement for foot units (except roman units).
Peasant equipped with war scythe - weapon made from reforging scythe or sickle into polearm head.
Peasant equipped with woodcutting axe. He can hit with some force.
Peasant equipped with grain flail. Force behind his attack is not that great, but it hits through armor.
Peasant equipped with hoe - simple farming tool.
Peasant equipped with morningstar - makeshift weapon made from wood. Sharp metal nails are inserted into wooden club to have greater effect.
Peasant equipped with pitchforks - simple farming tool. Viva la revolution. Say hay, tfu hey to the lords.
Peasant equipped with scythe - the best tool for harvest. Despite being unwieldy it can really damage unarmored enemies.
Peasant equipped with shovel. He can attack, but may also help a little on active build sites.
Peasant equipped with wooden spear. His weapon is only sharpened stick, but can be used quite effectively, especially against horses.
Peasant throwing stones. Some of serfs are great at throwing, so instead of taking some weapon, they will just throw picked stones.
Upgrade to Fortified Town to gain attack, aura granting defence to units garrisoned, higher healing rate and weak mending of units inside.
Fortified Town has attack and grants defence to units garrisoned. It also heals them better and even repairs a little.

Man-of-state and the member of The Senate, which controlled money, administration, and the details of foreign policy. It had the most control over day-to-day life. The power and authority of the Senate derived from precedent, the high caliber and prestige of the senators, and the Senate\'s unbroken lineage, which dated back to the founding of the Republic in 509 BC.
Lets you build: roman senator, support unit
The battle style of straight sickle (kama) with chain (kusari) attached. Chain is great for holding enemy or their weapons, while also allows ranged kama attack.
Bard is talker of stories, singer of heroics. They can influence others to be more active.
It\'s not only used for training soldiers - once fortified it\'s also used to treat wounds and defend inside.
It\'s a safe heaven for the ships, capable of repair. Beware - once destroyed all ships docking will also share the fate.
It allows for treating wounds - for both human and animal. Thanks to reinforcing walls with stone it can also be used for defending inside.
It\'s actually more like a military camp. Thanks to the elevated platform - it\'s a perfect place for archers to shoot from. Treating soldiers wounds is also possible.
Stone walls give it a little more resilience, additional crane and more equipment however gives much more useful advantage - possibility to repair machines inside.
Just like the docks - pier allows to dock a ship or two. Thanks to the flat, empty space around it\'s also perfect for small repairs.
Upgrades Barracks for more hp, armor and ability to heal soldiers inside and defend from the inside.
Upgrades Archery Range for more hp, armor and ability to heal soldiers inside and defend from the inside.
Upgrades Docks for more hp, armor and ability to repair ships inside.
Upgrades Stables for more hp, armor and ability to heal inside and defend from the inside.
Upgrades Siege Workshop for more hp, armor and ability to repair machines inside.
Usually regular fisherman. In times of war, his net is supplemented with metal weights and transformed into a weapon.

A bishop is an ordained minister, assigned to govern local regions and responsible for teaching doctrine, governing the faithful in his jurisdiction, sanctifying the world and representing the Church.
Sometimes also named witch or wise-woman. Specialist in herbal medicine.

Equipped with a very long pole, much longer than that of a normal spear, pikemen were known to make excellent formations to bar cavalry charges, and keep other soldiers away long enough to have other units to deal with them.
More armored and equipped with a better pike. Still employing increased range and advantage against cavalry. They are elites.

With no fear of dying, the Celts were fierce warriors with an unusual habit. Usually fighting without armour, clad in blue woad war paint and tattoos, and occasionally completely naked, a Celt was a force of nature on the ancient battlefield. Woad has a decent haemostatic effect too.

Decoration, a way to intimidating enemies, religious symbols for might and protection, signs of identification, tattoos are part of many cultures around the world, the oldest discovery for tattooed skin dates back 3000 B.C Warrior covered in tattoos r a memorable sight on battlefield, may the last one.
The overall ability to properly guide the ship.
Precise knowledge of arrangement and movement of stars, depending on the location. Allows travelling in the night, thus increasing overall travel speed.
Providing pikeman better armor and weapons makes them stronger and more resilient.
Even a small patch of trees provides excellent cover against archers.
Elevated terrain increases sight range. Can be used as great defending position.
Temporarily removing from the ranks of a church makes any authority null and void. Local population is neither very inclined to help anymore.
Immediately restores hp of flesh and blood unit.
A ranged attack, but affected by melee armor.
Any allied japanese unit in range will be affected.
Any enemy unit using horses in range of effect will be affected.

All garrisoned units will be affected.

Being reminded of rules and consequences of not following japanese code of honor - bushido - raises commitment.
Cavalry cannot properly act, nor defend if mounts are panicked.
Strong terrain advantage that allows to take greatest defensive positions.
Strong physical penalty reducing both attack and movement possibility.
Powerful mental effect reducing overall ability of unit.
Additional action as strong medical boost.
By consuming secret medicines and performing mental ritual unit goes into state of Berserk.
Using great techniques selected enemy is convinced of defeat.

Special combination of herbs is a medicine, which provides lasting protection against poisons.
Strong poison is applied on melee weapon.
Poison with additional slowing effect is applied on weapon. Greater technique of using gellous solution and powder pouches allows to also cover projectiles.
Poison with additional weakening effect is applied on weapon. Greater technique of using gellous solution and powder pouches allows to also cover projectiles.
Great music singed in preparation for great deeds - has effect on courage and the will to be first.
Battle song - main purpose and greatest live achievement of any bard. Singing of the deeds of great heroes gives zelous battle power boost.
Fortelling someone future can give them advantage of steady mind, better awareness of battlefield and additional strength to press forward. Even if fake.
By using specific symbols, speeches and overall presence convincing to zelous fighting can be achieved.
Real spreading fire causes damage each turn, despite the actions to putt it off.
Allows to pass through enemy units/buildings.
Heals each turn, disperses any poisons.
Overall boost coming from great mental state.
Chain in use, makes remaining too short to attack on range.
Skillfully throws a kusari with weight. It chains around weapon, sometimes arm or leg and severely limits both movement and attack of the enemy.
Overall boost coming from pride of belonging to greatest nation.
Legion formation - large scale formation concentrated on defense.
Overall decrease in capabilities coming from poor mental state.
Strong physical penalty reducing both attack and movement possibility.
Throws a net entangling enemy and reducing his movement and attack capabilities. Can be resisted by big units.
Change attire and held weapons, along with the usage of masking techniques to achieve assassin style stealth ability, but slower movement.
Change attire and held weapons for battle with kusarigama - a chain and japanese war sickle. Kusarigama user can attack on a little distance and bind enemy with chain.
Change attire and held weapons for battle with two sais. This type of battle stance gives great defensive capabilities against melee units. Especially weak ones.
Puts sea trap - barrels filled with explosives floating around and waiting to be bumped by the heavy hull, creating explosion.
Horrible poison deal damage each turn.
A poison deals damage each turn.
Strong poison deals damage each turn.
Weapon is covered by slowing poison.
Weapon is covered by weakening poison.
Powerful increase in attack capabilities, as well as easier managing of ranged siege engines.
Fast as wind and unstoppable - a mental state focused on travelling.
Fierce and feeling power - a mental state focused on battle.
Overall increase in capabilities thanks to belief in great luck.
Shoots smaller sized trebuchet, which is fitted around.
Attacks with his trusty taiaha - a very special kind of spear.
Attacks all units around with blades on the wheels.
Wheel blade attack can be especially dangerous to foot units.
High officer of the Roman army. Increases the morale of nearby units. Thanks to his great experience - he is stronger and more resilient, than regular leaders.

In times of war blacksmith can leave his smithy, take one of the weapons and some tools and go to the army. They are really handy on the battlefield, as they can repair and enhance weapons, armor and various tools. They can help to fix constructs a little, but won\'t help with building new ones. As they are not dedicated weaponsmiths or armorsmiths - their enhancement is really makeshift and won\'t last long.
Better tools allows increased ability to construct and/or repair.
Better weapons give increase in attack power.
Miners can construct various groundworks, among which - the most important - Mines. Digging underground is their specialisation and none other builder can beat them at that.
Mining can produce various minerals from deep underground. There is some use for any of them.

Silver can be used like money - to speed up production and to buy mercenaries time. It roughly valued as much as 1 money courier transport. Go with them into any factory building to speed up production. Or sacrifice them next to a mercenary unit to increase leaving time.

Gems can be used as money - to speed up production and to buy mercenaries time. It\'s roughly 3 times as valuable as money courier transports. Go with them into any factory building to speed up production. Or sacrifice them next to a mercenary unit to increase leaving time.

Gold can be used as money - to speed up production and to buy mercenaries time. It\'s roughly valued as much as 2 money courier transports. Go with them into any factory building to speed up production. Or sacrifice them next to a mercenary unit to increase leaving time.

Whole cart of less valuable ores - iron, bronze and stones good for construction. It can be used to speed up further constructions. Can be sacrificed, when adjacent to a Worker for construction bonus.
Salt is quite valuable, as it can be used to preserve meat. Very important for military. Mercenaries should easily accept it as payment. Well, it\'s salary after all.
Underground construction used for getting various minerals.
Ready materials of good quality sharply increase possibility to repair and/or construct.
Paying 3 times as much as money courier transport gives much longer time of employment.
Paying 2 times as much as money courier transport gives much longer time of employment.
Paying half as much as money courier transport gives less time of employment, but still enleghtens it.
Sacrifice this unit to increase construction and repair capabilities of target for some time.
Take some part of valuable material and send money courier with it.
Gives crusaders encouragement and with that - fighting strength. They believe, they are doing the right thing. Increases power, mental resistance and susceptibility to heal.
All units in range, which are on a crusade are affected with encouragement, related to holy mission, they are doing.

Gives crusaders encouragement and with that - fighting strength, especially in melee. They believe, they are taking sacred role - they are the god\'s servants. Increases power, mental resistance and melee armor.
All religious units (priests, knight brothers from monastic orders) in range are affected with encouragement, related to doing the god\'s work.
Increased capability coming from belief in executing higher power orders.
Increased capability coming from belief in having the mandate of higher power to do whatever is needed.
Cultivating correct herbs and knowledge about healing properties of flora helps with taking people back to battlefield.
Knowledge about exact workings of body not only extends capabilities to bring people back to good health, but also allows first aid in rudimentary environment, without harm.
Spending finance for transportation and feeding of voluntary holy war fighters can bring various people, specialized in different fields of battle.

Devout, sworn servant of religion. Works for the betterment of local population, feeding and finding place to sleep for pilgrims and weary travelers and most importantly helps with healing the sick and injured.
Famous, strong knights from germanic Teuton Order. They are devoted to converting pagans to one true faith.
Teutonic Knight specialized in cavalry to cavalry battles. They can convert enemies.
Komtur is the leader among teutonic brothers. He is so convinced about divine right of order doings, that it affects others arround. He can convert enemies.
Smaller monastery lead by prior or prioress. They often own very little property, sometimes even take vows of poverty. They can however dedicate the fruits of their work for the greater cause.

Warrior of holy war specialised in dealing with cavalry, but still capable of dealing with buildings and siege machines. Despite the lack of shield, thanks to good, he is no worse in melee, than others.
Warrior of holy war specialised in dealing with cavalry, but still capable of dealing with buildings and siege machines.
Warrior of holy war specialised in ranged battle. Heavy crossbow allows to deal better with armored foe.
Warrior of holy war specialised in ranged battle.
Warrior of holy war specialised in mobility.
Warrior of holy war, being the epitome of battle strength. Strong even among the knights.
Warrior of holy war specialised in melee battle and dealing with buildings and siege machines.
Warrior of holy war specialised in melee battle and dealing with buildings and siege machines. Thanks to good armor, he has better resistance to common ranged weapons.
Dedicated leader of holy war armies. His strong conviction of holy mission emanates among other crusaders.
A living place for community of monks or nuns. Local scientific center, also dedicated to healing sick and injured and taking in pilgrims. Often providing education, working on medicines, alcohol.
They are trained and equipped to be best at defending position.
By using better training, more technologically advanced bow and arrows, better armor and adding horse armor - Elite Horse Archers have greater attack and defence.

Even though crossbow normally has greater attack range than bow, not in case of mounted usage. But it allows using strong crossbows, almost as heavy as siege crossbow. These things will hurt even through heavy armor.
Better armored with stronger weapons. They are really good against armored units.
Better trained, armored and more resilient. They deal enormous damage against heavy melee units and siege machines. They are also quite good in regular siege battles.

Professional polearm infantry was common among mercenary forces. Among english and italian military bill was especially popular. Billman can do pretty well in sieges, but with additional ability to fight cavalry.

Name origin means something close to a bandit. Routiers, bandits are a people who band. They fight most commonly in a group, but sometimes individally as a scout. Common routier was later a member of mercenary band or free company. Became common place around Hundred Years War, being employed as a skirmishers.

Ferocious warrior and highly sought mercenary. Unlike the look, his weapon was not used like two-handed sword, but more like an battleaxe or warhammer. Great against armored opponents. Following attacks are even stronger as he can cleave shields and armor plates.

Famous nordic mercenary soldier. Was mostly fighting in Eastern Europe and Middle East. As nordic armies made an example for common foot soldiers, good overall ability and great specialization in sieges can be expected.
Mercenary contractor - was the leader of a band or company of sellswords. In terrains, where cities was dependent on acting mercenary force - they were also powerful in politics.

Deemed the best of ancient mercenary shooters. Not because of the damage, nor range, but versatility. He can participate in the sieges by occasionally firing flame arrow to make things burn. He can deal some damage to heavy armored opponents using heavy arrows, but doesn\'t have enough strength and/or ordinance to do it constantly. And on top of all that - he works like a regular archer in between.
Mercenary longbowman. Between english wars many brave enough archers was looking for temporary employment elsewhere. They shoot far. They shoot accurately. They shoot deadly.

All around the world knights (and their equivalents) were seeking additional income. Often as an sellswords. Sometimes, especially during sieges, they went to battle on foot. The armor is their life and training and experience in melee, they have is tremendous. Expect them to be good at the first line of battle, but avoid cavalry.
Broken Armor and/or defensive equipment reduces survivability.
Upgrades Heavy Horse Archers to Elite Horse Archers.
Upgrades Horse Crossbowmen to Heavy Horse Crossbowmen.
Allows Crusade Leaders to immediately hire basic crusader units by sacrificing valuables (Money Courier, Carts with precious minerals, etc.) provided around them.

True knights - armored, resilient and capable. They are trained in the ways of medicine, but also fighting. Especially effective against mounted forces, they also have deal a little better with armored opponents.
Ultimate holding forces - very resilient, can survive through long volleys of arrows and counter mounted forces, which could have tried to break the hold.
Additional aura for roman commanding units (centurion), which increases range of missile units +1.
Roman missile units in effect area gets increased range of attack.
Properly planned ranged attacks are more effective.

Inquisitors had the right to put someone on trial for heresy or witchcraft. The possibilities didn\'t even end there - they could ask any brother or sister in faith for help and they had to. Even if it would mean almost sure suicide, at least the family would be safe. People reacted to such authority in similar way - they sucked up, they fled or just tried to stay low, but they all felt fear. It\'s perfectly logical - with an accusation they could ruin someone easily, they had immense influence, they were untouchable in times of peace. Some of that dready reputation was spread among enemies, so they felt fear too. Enough to often be converted and accept servitude to inquisitor.
Who can attack unarmed person, which prays at the moment. Well - every good soldier, but they will be a little reluctant to do so. Increases resilience of unarmed and unarmored religious healers.
Gives monks ability to chant religious texts - it increases effectiveness of religious conversion, healing.
Increased speed, due to forced run.

A specialist ship/crew for a hire. Mainly used to capture the ships, not destroy them. But when the damage would be too great or no other option to survive - it can also destroy using cannons. Unique in versatility - they often had many contacts to buy or sell ships quickly, so could even appear somewhere else to fight. It\'s also often more safe to quickly get rid of war ships and just get easier transportable goods instead.

A specialist ship/crew for a hire. Right now on land, but they are vulnerable here - quickly get them to the closest port, pier or even some shallows to at least have a chance to get on a ship (or maybe it was already transported here by the rest of the crew?).
Nordic warriors riding their horses for a fast and brutal assault. Better equipped and trained than regular Axe Knights.

A castle on elephant back make it quite convenient to prepare shot and save the fire all the time. While unstable platform shakes is evened out by higher position in attack - it also provides great ability to defend.

Just like horse crossbowmen - this unit cannot really shoot on the move, but it\'s really close to it. Their horses are trained to ignore close shots and can even stand firmly during it, but more often man just got off the horse for a shot and loaded on the move.

Winged Polish Hussars, after investing quite extensively in lance technology got longest lances in entire history. They could outrange almost all polearm units, dealing devastating, fast attacks against them. Many mercenaries got a clause in contract to leave the battlefield in the event of winged hussars appearance. Well - they weren\'t as effective vs mounted units as other lancers, but nothing is perfect.
Hungarian hussars abandoned the use of shields and used firearms. They still were great specialists at destroying unprotected infantry units thought.
Mounted late medieval knight, which uses pistol and a sword. Wears relatively lighter armor than other heavy cavalry, but apart from shooting, can still execute quite effective charge if needed.
Gunpowder infantry equipped with polearms, which was used also like a stand for weapon. Effective vs mounted units and great shooters.

This is a FUN unit (available only in spells enabled games). In real life cannons were never mounted on elephants, because of the weight. Also castle or any fittings would be destroyed on recoil. But what if some stronger elephants existed?

The Normans were originally nords, making plundering raids on coastal settlements, but later they themselves settled. Norman Lancer is a knight using fighting style, being a mix between norse and french.

The name derives from an old Norse name for common household servants (house karl), but it later came to mean the elite household guards of a nordic lords. These were best professional troops, carrying the best equipment he could afford. Their sole duties were training, guard duty, and war.

Social elites trained from young age in archery, amongst others skills. Unlike the bulk of archer lines, they were armored and protected. They commonly shot from larger distance for safety, which was possible, thanks to special pricier bows.

The stradioti were pioneers of new light cavalry tactics during their era. They used hit-and-run tactics, ambushes, feigned retreats and other complex maneuvers. They were known for cutting off the heads of dead or captured enemies, because they were paid by head.
Repeating crossbow. It was inaccurate, usually used against masses of men and horses, but allowed even barely trained peasants to shoot with great frequency.

Light hoplite. The name means \'out-runners\', and denotes their ability to exit the phalanx and fight in an irregular order, as the situation might demand. The Ekdromoi were mostly lightly armoured (with aspis and bronze helmet) fast infantry and were armed with spear and short sword.
Some of the men just took fire to the battle.
If archery is so common in a culture, that everybody trains it, even commoners take it to the field.

The eagles were soldiers of the Sun, for the eagle was the symbol of the Sun. Eagle warriors dressed like eagles, adorning themselves with eagle feathers, and wearing headgear with an eagle head on it. The Eagle Warriors are among the highest ranking warriors in Aztec society.

Jaguars were representation of Tezcatlipoca - the god of night, earth, war and strife, who created obsidian. Aztecs wore jaguar skin dress at war because they believed the animal\'s strengths would be given to them during battles. They could also receive god\'s blessings. Jaguar warriors were used at the battlefront in military campaigns.
Infantry using mcuahuitl: - essentially a wooden sword with sharp obsidian blades embedded into its sides. Very effective against less armored targets.
Elites among aztec warriors - they gained status by combat deeds. Still using mcuahuitl, but trained to strike more effectively. Also more resilient.
While not used to shoot at the same distances, like archers from other regions, they used ymtl - war arrows with barbed obsidian. Very damaging to unarmored targets.
Very important caste of aztec society. They performed main rituals in theocratic system.
Infantry using tepoztplli - wooden spear with a broad head edged with sharp obsidian blades.
A place where knowledge keepers, senior warriors and veterans train and equip youngings.

They were the elite cavalry of the Macedonian army. The Companions probably constituted the first real shock cavalry in history, able to conduct charges against massed infantry. Their coordination is great and allows for stronger attacks, when another unit of companions is near.
Fierce warriors coming to fight almost naked, believing in luck and protection of nature.

More resilent upgrade of workers, who are non-combat supportive units who carry tools with them. They construct buildings which help you in defending the TCs or recruiting units. They also mend the damaged buildings and other constructs with great effectiveness.

Wolf warriors appear among the legends of the Indo-Europeans, Turks, Mongols, and Native American cultures. The frenzy warriors wearing the skins of wolves attacked with fast and fierce strikes. They came into the main battle almost naked, without any body armor, but survived longer than regular infantry. They were described: went without their mailcoats and were mad as hounds or wolves, bit their shields... they slew men, but neither fire nor iron had effect upon them.
Regular infantry with quite strong anti-mounted capabilities. Perfect for the bulk of an army.
Either a royal consort or a ruler of the land
A ship filled with valuables always swims somewhere to trade. They can speed up the researches and the recruitment of units.

The gallowglasses (from Irish: gall glaigh meaning foreign warriors) were a class of elite warriors of Norse-Gaelic clans from Scotland - descendants of Norse settlers who had intermarried with the local population. They were noted for wielding the massive two-handed sparth axe - the weapon with tremendous power, easily capable of breaking the ranks of enemy. Especially effective against lightly armored opponents.
Increases axe knight power and resilience.
Increases aztec swordsman power and resilience.
Not only increases most aspects of Hungarian Hussar, but gives Pistol Shot ability - ranged attack, effective even against armored units.
Not only increases most aspects of Hussar, but much more importantly gives unique among cavalry pikeman-like ranged attack.
Enables all elephant units to sacrifice action for movement boost this turn.
Increases power of all other companion units in range.
Increased attack capabilities due to great coordination.
Short range attack with handgonne damage bonuses.
Long range attack with handgonne damage bonuses.
If at port, pier or some shallows - get\'s on a corsair ship (freshly bought, previously hidden or brought by other crew members), effectively transforming into it .
If at port, pier or some shallows - leaves ship, transforming into infantry unit (and ship is sold, hidden or brought by other crew members somewhere else).
Sells ship to get merchant ship filled with valuables (doesn\'t work on mercenary ships, merchant ships, fishing boats, row boats).
Use to sacrifice action to get increased speed this turn only (don\'t use when move was already made).
Damages all enemies around with melee attack, having bonus damage against foot units.
Melee damage with bonus against foot units.
Has a chance to convert ships on attack.
Goes into rage, increasing power, speed, mental resistance, armors and giving additional attack, but decreasing sight and disallowing any healing.
Unit briefly concentrates on repairing only - construction is turned off, but two more powerful repair actions can be made.
Increases chance of conversion on boarding attempts.
Attack is strongly concentrated on armor, shields and formation breaking.
Overall ability to convert enemy to our side by using any sort of propaganda.
Overall ability to take enemy ships - crew size, fighting ability, knowledge of enemy positions and ranks, ship structure and finally any sort of propaganda, although to much lesser extent.
Doesn\'t matter if it\'s by using faith, patriotism or any other strong affection. Great speech can have the effect to help fight conversion attempts.
Using great speech can lessen or even dismiss effects of foreign propaganda, like conversion attempts. Unfortunately it\'s double edged sword. It also affects previous speeches promoting loyalty.

The yumi (japanese bow) is exceptionally tall, standing over two meters, and typically surpasses the height of the archer. They are made by laminating bamboo, wood and leather. The yumi is asymmetric - in case the bow is made from a single piece of wood, lower grip balances elasticity difference between the part taken from the treetop side and the other side.

Balearic slingers would be unable to eat until they were able to knock their food off of a perch with their sling. Slings were simple to pick up but took a lifetime to master the precise angle and flick of the wrist needed to hit a man at long distance. The actual sling could also be simply constructed or elegantly crafted by an expert. Balearic slingers often had several types of slings, likely for use at different ranges. The different types of shot seemed to be used at different ranges as well.
Better equipment, horses and training has been given to mounted skirmishers to make them more useful.
A mercenary unit capable of defending areas and military positions. It has a high amount of health and armor to withstand ranged attacks and some melee blows, however it is a slow unit.
The archers of the norse are armed with a bow and arrow as a ranged weapon often used an axe at closer distance. They could even shot flaming arrows to burn the enemy buildings.

The Rajput (literally king\'s son) were members of one of the major Hindu Kshatriya (warrior) groups who live in Rajasthan and most of the north India and parts of Pakistan. The khanda was the favoured melee weapon of the rajput and they used round metal shields called dhal. Rajput\'s also has an ability to throw a chakram.

An odachi or nodachi was a type of traditionally made Japanese sword used by the samurai class of feudal Japan. The Chinese equivalent and \'cousin\' for this type of sword in terms of weight and length is the miao dao, and the Western battlefield equivalent is zweihander or claymore. The nodachi and odachi swords were used for making strong striking actions and killing in a single action. It requires great strength and power to use the nodachi sword effectively.

A ronin (a drifter or wanderer) was a samurai after death of his lord or being banished by him. According to the Bushido Shoshinshu (the Code of the Warrior), a samurai was supposed to commit seppuku (aka harakiri, belly cutting, a form of ritual suicide) upon the loss of his master. One who chose not to honor the code was on his own and was meant to suffer great shame. Former samurai could not legally take up a new trade, so many rnin became mercenaries that guarded trade caravans, bodyguards for wealthy merchants or hired muscle for gangs.

Unlike classic greek phalanx, employed by hoplites, macedonian version started to be dependant much more on a weapon, rather than shield. Soldiers focus was set on sarissa - a double-pointed pike. The sarissae were carried in two pieces before a battle and then slid together when they were being used. Such long weapon could easily keep its enemies at a distance and allow to attack from the back of first lines.

Camel archers are marksmen wielding bows mounted on camels. They took their popularity in the Crusades, used in Arabia, Asian and Eurasian countries. They are not so fast compared to the horses of war but camels has a smell that can freak out nearby horses making them slightly weaker in a nearby battle against them.

A pavise (or pavis, pabys, or pavesen) was an oblong shield used during the late 14th to early 16th centuries. Often large enough to cover the entire body, it was used by archers, crossbowmen and other infantry soldiers
Legendary heroics can inspire for great deeds. Many of them are among the best stories bard can sing.
Sacrificing caught enemies (killing strike) will boost social standing of warriors in a unit, giving access to more manpower, better weapons and loyalty boost.
Aztec Priest speaks instructions from the god of wind itself exactly how to shoot. Often provides blessed by god weapons and projectiles (better ones).

Priests manage human sacrifices and encourages all warriors to catch enemies alive, instead of killing. But they are sacrificed at the altar anyway. Warriors status is directly dependent on number of sacrifices provided.
As there is an altar managed by priest close enough, some enemies will be catched and sacrificed instead of killing them all. It will boost all warriors status.
By performing strange rituals and using superstitious beliefs, the onmyoji declares his enemies to be possessed by the oni demons thus they are no longer trusted or able to participate in battle.
Geass, geis, deis - a strong belief of celtic people, that some obligation or prohibition can be set upon them by supernatural beings. This one obligates to Attack.
Geass, geis, deis - a strong belief of celtic people, that some obligation or prohibition can be set upon them by supernatural beings. This one obligates to Move.

Geass, geis, deis - a strong belief of celtic people, that some obligation or prohibition can be set upon them by supernatural beings. This one obligates to Survive. Such strong believe can bring heroic actions.
Overall upgrade of equipment and training.
The best training and upgrade of equipment.

Belief in Oni is spread around to induce doubt and maybe even slight fear. Useful for future propaganda. Unlocks Declare Oni Possessed ability, that brings all this cumulated doubt to lock units with social limitations (who to trust, if I act will others doubt me?, should I take any action?) making them incapable of any action, apart of moving.

Research on shooting trajectories, wind and rain effect on projectiles. Along with preparation of better ranged weapons and projectiles, kept by priests caste, allows them to give blessing to units - supplying them by limited ordnance and instructions.
A unit using guerilla tactics of fast ambushes against less protected enemy units, supply lines, support. Useful for scouting too. Can participate in skirmishes to some lesser extent.

Lowest rank of assassins. Really a novice unit not yet taught real assassination techniques, hiding and social knowledge. But already trained in combat, especially - how to strike least protected, but most strategic targets. Devout and determined.
Unit who pillages villages and towns for fun.
A brigand is a member of a gang that ambushes and robs people in forests and mountains. Weak alone but can excel at numbers.

Deserters from army, that intentionally left to roam on already passed, safer terrains were often called marauders. Thus much better trained and equipped than common outlaws. This one specifically is semi-organized ranged unit.
Brutal leaders of the marauder groups. Insanely powerful unit.

The Celts are probably the best known charioteers. They would break the ranks of the enemy with the dread of their horses and the noise of their wheels; and when they have worked themselves in between the troops, leap from their chariots and engage on foot.

A member of the high-ranking class in Celtic cultures. Religious leaders, but also legal authorities, adjudicators, lorekeepers, medical professionals, and political advisors. Prevented by doctrine from recording their knowledge in written form, must have trained great memory.

Celts being proud warrior race, the tribal Chieftain was usually one of the best fighters - but even more important was his strategic ability and command skills. His mere presence was enough to inspire his men, knowing they were being well led by a capable and intelligent warrior.
Using a shorter bow normally made of elm rather than the standard yew of longbows. Often used in ambush tactics.
Unit strongly concentrated on defending against enemy cavalry. Not strictly uniform, but nevertheless organized and deadly effective on attacking mounted units.
Veterans, less capable in combat due to age concentrate instead on training youngins.

On top of animals back is tightly attached tower from which troops would fight, while being more protected. The elephant itself would normally be covered with armour. Mostly used by Achaemenids, Seleucids and Sasanians.
Not born into leadership. Theyve had to earn it through blood, sweat and steel. Simple yet brutal, being feared by many, but almost revered by their own.
A brave archer from a distant land.
Quickly organized unit concentrated on siege warfare and countering heavy armored infantry.
Armed with a Tmtlatl: A sling made from maguey fiber. Using oval shaped rocks or hand-molded clay balls filled with obsidian flakes as projectiles. Surprisingly good against armored targets.

Priests manage human sacrifices and encourages all warriors to catch enemies alive, instead of killing. But they are sacrificed at the altar anyway. Warriors status is directly dependent on number of sacrifices provided.
Rough, often pointy hard stones close to water surface. Dangerous and commonly very treacherous for ships. Do not even approach!

After successfully developing the spacious chariots, blacksmiths have become more ambitious and set their eyes on elephant castles - how to design them for better stability to mount onto any elephants and increase capacity of those mounted on milder elephants.

Literally Horse-men. Originally recruited from patricians and created equestrian order social class. Very quickly changed to include commoners. Specialized in quick manouvers and fights against other cavalry.

The most heavily armoured mounted knight. They are the main shock troopers and responsible to lead the charge in the army. Due to their big shields and heavy armour, they are difficult to kill, but slightly slow.

The most heavily armoured mounted knight. They are the main shock troopers and responsible to lead the charge in the army. Due to their big shields and heavy armour, they are difficult to kill, but slightly slow.
Set of reforms of roman army, that allows recruitment of new unified heavy infantry - legionary unit.
Allows possibility to call units from stationary auxila legions to the defence of garrison every few turns.
Elite unit - ancient super heavy cavalry. Both men and horses fully clad in armor.

Geis is a must. There is no way to break it according to legends. But ... druids can use their knowledge to explain how it was somehow mistakenly understood - that it covers someone else fate or have some conditions, that were already met.
Doesn\'t matter if it\'s by using faith, patriotism or any other strong affection. Great speech can have the effect to help fight conversion attempts.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. His chief weapon is an old sword, which he found along his journey. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee\'s learned the bow to attack at distance.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. His chief weapon is an old sword, found along his journey. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee\'s weapon has been upgraded and he has learned the bow, and, when he gains more experience, he can pick better armor or be trained in attack, which will also increase his capabilities as ranged unit.

Trainee was the first to make it to the base of the Night Watch. His chief weapon is an old sword, found along his journey. Though not first in strength or skill, he possesses qualities of the mind that bring him always to leadership. Trainee\'s armor has been upgraded and he has learned the bow, and, when he gains more experience, he can be trained again in armor or concentrate on attack, which will also increase his capabilities as ranged unit..

Bearing an ancient sword that he found, Trainee was the first to arrive at the base of the Night Watch. Though not first in strength or skill, he is always in leadership, for a good leader is also a learner. Trainee has been upgraded fully into a quick, offence oriented unit, his sword a potent power, just as his bow, as he is proficient in strategy. Yet still he gains knowledge as he waits for his time to retake his home.

Bearing an ancient sword that he found, Trainee was the first to arrive at the base of the Night Watch. Though not first in strength or skill, he is always in leadership, for a good leader is also a learner. Trainee has been upgraded fully into a quick, balanced unit, not so bad in defence, capable in attack and still able to shoot a bow - overall deadly, as he is proficient in strategy. Yet still he gains knowledge as he waits for his time to retake his home.

Bearing an ancient sword that he found, Trainee was the first to arrive at the base of the Night Watch. Though not first in strength or skill, he is always in leadership, for a good leader is also a learner. Trainee has been upgraded fully into a quick, defense oriented unit, with ranged attack - can deal with any enemy, as he is proficient in strategy. Yet still he gains knowledge as he waits for his time to retake his home.
Flying scouts are the advanced version of the scouts. They can move faster and fly over mountains and water.
